Parsers¶

Functions which parses data from DanMax : measument data, Haldor Topsøe: MS data, Heater data, Flow data.

functions.parsers.danmax_xrd(file, timestamp_name='XRDTimeStamp', xscan=False)¶

Function for parsing DanMax xrd data.

Parameters

file (str) – DanMax timestamp file, .txt

Returns

Dataframe with xrd timestamp data.

Return type

(dataframe)

functions.parsers.topas(file)¶

Function for parsing topas refined data.

Parameters

file (str) – Topas data file, .txt

Returns

Dataframe with topas refined data.

Return type

(dataframe)

functions.parsers.heater(file, sheet_name='Log', timestamp_name='HistoricalTimeString')¶

Function for parsing data from Topsøe MS system into a pandas dataframe.

Parameters

  • file (str) – Heater data file, .xlsm

  • sheet_name (str, optional) – Sheet Name in the excel file. Defaults to “Log”.

  • timestamp_name (str, optional) – The column name containing the timestamp in the excel file. Defaults to “HistoricalTimeString”.

Returns

Dataframe with heater data.

Return type

(dataframe)

functions.parsers.ms(file)¶

Function for parsing data from Topsøe MS system into a pandas dataframe.

Parameters

file (str) – MS data file, .asc.

Returns

Dataframe with MS data.

Return type

(dataframe)

functions.parsers.gas_system(file, timestamp_name='Timestamp')¶

Function for parsing data from Topsøe gas system into a pandas dataframe.

Parameters

  • file (str) – gas system data file.

  • timestamp_name (str, optional) – The column name containing the timestamp in the gas system data file.

Returns

Dataframe with heater data.

Return type

(dataframe)
